test_name: Code-Interpreter sandbox prevents outbound network even via `socket`

dns_resolution.details: DNS resolution via socket.getaddrinfo was blocked.

socket_connection.details: Direct socket connection to 8.8.8.8:53 was blocked.

http_requests.error_message: <urlopen error [Errno -3] Temporary failure in name resolution>
http_requests.details: HTTP request with urllib.request.urlopen was blocked due to DNS failure.

subprocess_commands.details: Subprocess attempting to run 'ping' was blocked; command not found.

security_assessment.network_isolation: All tested outbound network operations (DNS, sockets, HTTP, subprocess network tools) are blocked.
recommendations: Continue current sandbox configuration for strong isolation.
Reevaluate if any outbound or interprocess communication should be allowed for specific use cases.

details.result: PASS: Code-Interpreter sandbox is effective (blocked 100% of operations)
